code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Contact.scss';import githubLogo from'../assets/github.svg';import linkedinLogo from'../assets/linkedin.svg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Contact=_ref=>{let{translations}=_ref;const[copied,setCopied]=useState(false);const[hover,setHover]=useState(false);const email='jose.farelo@hotmail.com';const copyToClipboard=()=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(email);setCopied(true);setTimeout(()=>setCopied(false),1500);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:translations.contactTitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://ar.linkedin.com/in/josefarelo",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"icon-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:linkedinLogo,alt:"LinkedIn",className:"icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://github.com/josefarelo",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"icon-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:githubLogo,alt:"GitHub",className:"icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{onClick:copyToClipboard,onMouseEnter:()=>setHover(true),onMouseLeave:()=>setHover(false),className:"email",children:[email,hover&&!copied&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"popup",children:translations.copy}),copied&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"popup",children:translations.copied})]})]})]});};export default Contact;
